quotes.q: Love your neighbor as yourself.
Do not be overcome by evil, but overcome evil with good.
The truth is from your Lord, so do not be among the doubters.
Speak what is true, speak what is pleasant, and do not speak unpleasant truths.
Better than a thousand hollow words is one word that brings peace.
What is hateful to you, do not do to others.
Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
The best among you are those who have the best character.
All action results from thought, so it is thoughts that matter.
Justice, justice shall you pursue.
Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
Let all that you do be done in love.
The real way to happiness is to live in the present moment.
Do good to others, it will come back in unexpected ways.
Seek knowledge from the cradle to the grave.
Love your neighbor as yourself.
Do not be overcome by evil, but overcome evil with good.
The truth is from your Lord, so do not be among the doubters.
Speak what is true, speak what is pleasant, and do not speak unpleasant truths.
Better than a thousand hollow words is one word that brings peace.
What is hateful to you, do not do to others.
Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
The best among you are those who have the best character.
All action results from thought, so it is thoughts that matter.
Justice, justice shall you pursue.
Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
Let all that you do be done in love.
The real way to happiness is to live in the present moment.
Do good to others, it will come back in unexpected ways.
Seek knowledge from the cradle to the grave.
For every hardship there is relief.
The wound is the place where the Light enters you.
Your task is not to seek for love, but merely to seek and find all the barriers within yourself that you have built against it.
The most beautiful things in life are not things. They're people, and places, and memories, and pictures.
Be in this world as if you were a stranger or a traveler.
In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
Who is wise? One who learns from every person.
The highest form of wisdom is kindness.
Love your fellow as yourself - this is a fundamental principle of the Torah.
If I am not for myself, who will be for me? If I am only for myself, what am I?
For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son.
Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid; do not be discouraged.
I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me.
Faith is the substance of things hoped for, the evidence of things not seen.
The peace of God, which transcends all understanding, will guard your hearts.
Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.
When you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it.
Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
What you seek is seeking you.
Those who cannot remember the past are condemned to repeat it.
Two things awe me most - the starry sky above me and the moral law within me.
The unexamined life is not worth living.
Know thyself.
He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
The more you know, the more you realize you don't know.
The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
Life is suffering. But you can transcend it.
It is better to live your own destiny imperfectly than to live an imitation of somebody else's life with perfection.
You have the right to work, but never to the fruit of work.
Change is the law of the universe. What you resist, persists.
In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
Love your neighbor as yourself.
Do not be overcome by evil, but overcome evil with good.
The truth is from your Lord, so do not be among the doubters.
Speak what is true, speak what is pleasant, and do not speak unpleasant truths.
Better than a thousand hollow words is one word that brings peace.
What is hateful to you, do not do to others.
Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
The best among you are those who have the best character.
All action results from thought, so it is thoughts that matter.
Justice, justice shall you pursue.
Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
Let all that you do be done in love.
The real way to happiness is to live in the present moment.
Do good to others, it will come back in unexpected ways.
Seek knowledge from the cradle to the grave.
For every hardship there is relief.
The wound is the place where the Light enters you.
Your task is not to seek for love, but merely to seek and find all the barriers within yourself that you have built against it.
The most beautiful things in life are not things. They're people, and places, and memories, and pictures.
Be in this world as if you were a stranger or a traveler.
In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
Who is wise? One who learns from every person.
The highest form of wisdom is kindness.
Love your fellow as yourself - this is a fundamental principle of the Torah.
If I am not for myself, who will be for me? If I am only for myself, what am I?
For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son.
Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid; do not be discouraged.
I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me.
Faith is the substance of things hoped for, the evidence of things not seen.
The peace of God, which transcends all understanding, will guard your hearts.
Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.
When you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it.
Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
What you seek is seeking you.
Those who cannot remember the past are condemned to repeat it.
Two things awe me most - the starry sky above me and the moral law within me.
The unexamined life is not worth living.
Know thyself.
He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
The more you know, the more you realize you don't know.
The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
Life is suffering. But you can transcend it.
It is better to live your own destiny imperfectly than to live an imitation of somebody else's life with perfection.
You have the right to work, but never to the fruit of work.
Those who are able to see beyond the illusions of this world find happiness in every moment.
The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
Let yourself be silently drawn by the strange pull of what you really love. It will not lead you astray.
Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
The quieter you become, the more you are able to hear.
Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be.
Patience is not the ability to wait, but the ability to keep a good attitude while waiting.
If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
If you are irritated by every rub, how will your mirror be polished?
He who does not trust enough will not be trusted.
The only journey is the one within.
Be kind, for everyone you meet is fighting a hard battle.
A man who conquers himself is greater than one who conquers a thousand men in battle.
In a gentle way, you can shake the world.
Let yourself be guided by the principles of compassion, kindness, and tolerance.
To know what you know and what you do not know, that is true knowledge.
Do not let the behavior of others destroy your inner peace.
To love another person is to see the face of God.
The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.
What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
Do small things with great love.
